resources.string: Welcome to IndoorAtlas app! Please watch the tutorial video on Youtube!

"Collecting map data:
Please start by walking to a place in the building where you wish to begin your map data collection and click the \"start point\" icon.
Then, please click on the floor plan to select a start point for your path.
You may zoom, rotate and pan the floor plan in order to make it easier to orientate yourself with respect to the floor plan.
Afterwards, click the same button again and then select another point on the floor plan to indicate the end point of your path.
Finally, click the record button and walk along the path from the start point to the end point, and click the stop icon.
Please walk at constant speed."
Rotate the device around its axes as shown below. Keep the center of the device in place while rotating.
Calibrating...please rotate the device around all axes.
Please rotate the device around all axes. Waiting...
Waiting for Android internal calibration, please continue figure eight motion...
Calibration is taking a long time. Click here to try an alternative calibration method.
Calibrate the device with gentle back and forth movements as shown below.

Calibration is taking a long time. It is possible that the sensors of the device are not working properly. You may still try positioning but the accuracy may not be good. Mapping is disabled. Please contact support@indooratlas.com for more information.
Click path to select and delete.
Tap bottom-left icon to start mapping.
Tap screen to set start point.
Tap screen to set end point.
To continue from last point, just tap screen to set end point. Click reset to remove first point.
Tap point or path to select it. Selected path can be bent.
Tap the record button and start walking.
All paths already uploaded to IndoorAtlas.
The selected measurement is being deleted...

"Collecting validation paths:
Start by clicking the \"start point\" icon.
Proceed by clicking at a few points on the screen and the \"confirm point\" icon to mark your validation path.
Finally, click the record button and walk along the path from the start point to the end point, and click stop icon.
When you pass a black circle on the validation path, please tap screen to label a check point."
Tap display or click volume button on checkpoints.
All validation path check points already stored.
Downloading floor plan image failed due to a network error. Please retry.
Fetching recorded paths from IndoorAtlas Maps...
Warning: checkpoint should approx. overlap with a map segment!
Maximum measurement duration exceeded. Please consider splitting your path to multiple sub-paths and record again.
Connection lost for a long time. Positioning was reinitialized.
Could not connect to IndoorAtlas. Please check your network connections. If the problem persists, contact IndoorAtlas suppport.
Starting positioning failed due to an internal error.
Initialized -- please continue walking to get location fix.
Session was stopped because of high network latency.
Error in starting positioning. Possibly map has not been generated.
Error in communicating to IndoorAtlas Maps
Mobile Hipri is experimental feature and might not work with all devices/networks. Are you sure?
"We're sorry, Geocoder service is not available in your platform. You will not be able to search locations by name."
No buildings found in the visible map area.
No floor plans uploaded for the selected level
Storing calibration to IndoorAtlas Maps failed due to a network error. Please retry.
Initiating map generation failed due to a network error. Please retry.
"Generating map in the cloud. This may take a while, click Back to continue working."
Map generation continues in the cloud. You may start positoning after a while.
Map generation status request failed due to a network error.
Select the server to use for positioning
Login failed due to a network timeout.
No network connections. Please connect to a WiFi network or enable mobile data on your device.
No network connections. Please connect to a WiFi network or enable mobile data on your device.
Too low sampling rate in sensor(s) for reliable positioning.
Connection to positioning service could not be established.
Positioning service could not retrieve map.
Selected motion mode is not supported.
